page.title: 13CHILDREN'S RECREATION
page.content: Many people enjoy doing leisure pursuits that involve their friends.These include badminton and sguash but these are more for the athletic boys.The keep-fit craze is in for part of the class becuase they enjoy swimming,jogging and running.Cycling is popular with boys and girls and a percentage of the class enjoy it.Guides and Brownies are for girls who do not like watching television.Girls in particular enjoy walking along the sandy beaches nearby to join their friends for a picnic.Boys enjoy building ramps and making race tracks to race their friends on their B.M.X.bicycles.some of the children take part in the sports facilities at Newton Community Centre.
